mapper.sql: PKID, BILLID, REFUNDAPPLYCODE, PAYNOTESCODE, PERFORMDEPT, CREATEUSER, RECUSERNAME, RECUSERBANK, RECUSERBANKACCOUNT, REFUNDREASON, AUDITOR, AUDITAMT, CREATETIME, TOTALAMT, CREATER, AGENTBANK, PRINTTAG, VERSION, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DT, LAST_UPD_BY, LAST_UPD_DATE, AREACODE, PROCESSSTATUS, PRFRMDEPTNAME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from FS_REFUNDINFO
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
select sys_guid() from dual
insert into FS_REFUNDINFO (PKID, BILLID, REFUNDAPPLYCODE, PAYNOTESCODE, PERFORMDEPT, CREATEUSER, RECUSERNAME, RECUSERBANK, RECUSERBANKACCOUNT, REFUNDREASON, AUDITOR, AUDITAMT, CREATETIME, TOTALAMT, CREATER, AGENTBANK, PRINTTAG, VERSION, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DT, LAST_UPD_BY, LAST_UPD_DATE, AREACODE, PROCESSSTATUS, PRFRMDEPTNAME) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{refundapplycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paynotescode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{performdept,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recuserbank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recuserbankaccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refundreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditor,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{auditamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creater,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{agentbank,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{printtag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{areacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prfrmdeptname,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update FS_REFUNDINFO
PKID = #{record.pkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BILLID = #{record.billid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REFUNDAPPLYCODE = #{record.refundapplycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYNOTESCODE = #{record.paynotescode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PERFORMDEPT = #{record.performdept,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATEUSER = #{record.createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECUSERNAME = #{record.recusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECUSERBANK = #{record.recuserbank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECUSERBANKACCOUNT = #{record.recuserbankaccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REFUNDREASON = #{record.refundreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUDITOR = #{record.auditor,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AUDITAMT = #{record.auditamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATETIME = #{record.createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOTALAMT = #{record.totalamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATER = #{record.creater,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AGENTBANK = #{record.agentbank,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRINTTAG = #{record.printtag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
VERSION = #{record.version,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_BY = #{record.createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_DT = #{record.createdDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_UPD_BY = #{record.lastUpdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_UPD_DATE = #{record.lastUpdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
AREACODE = #{record.areacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCESSSTATUS = #{record.processstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRFRMDEPTNAME = #{record.prfrmdeptname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update FS_REFUNDINFO set PKID = #{record.pkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BILLID = #{record.billid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REFUNDAPPLYCODE = #{record.refundapplycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYNOTESCODE = #{record.paynotescode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERFORMDEPT = #{record.performdept,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATEUSER = #{record.createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECUSERNAME = #{record.recusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECUSERBANK = #{record.recuserbank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECUSERBANKACCOUNT = #{record.recuserbankaccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REFUNDREASON = #{record.refundreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDITOR = #{record.auditor,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AUDITAMT = #{record.auditamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATETIME = #{record.createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTALAMT = #{record.totalamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATER = #{record.creater,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AGENTBANK = #{record.agentbank,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRINTTAG = #{record.printtag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, VERSION = #{record.version,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATED_BY = #{record.createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_DT = #{record.createdDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPD_BY = #{record.lastUpdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_UPD_DATE = #{record.lastUpdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, AREACODE = #{record.areacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCESSSTATUS = #{record.processstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRFRMDEPTNAME = #{record.prfrmdeptname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select t.pkid,t.billid,t.refundapplycode,t.paynotescode ,t.performdept,t.createuser,t.recusername,t.recuserbank ,t.recuserbankaccount,t.refundreason,t.auditor,t.auditamt ,t.createtime,t.totalamt,t.creater,t.agentbank,t.printtag ,t.version,t.created_by,t.created_dt,t.last_upd_by,t.last_upd_date ,t.areacode,t.processstatus ,p.deptname as prfrmdeptname from fs_refundinfo t left join fs_base_performdept p on t.performdept=p.deptcode where t.refundapplycode=#{refundappcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
